channel.title: tech on BinaryDigit
channel.description: Recent content in tech on BinaryDigit

item.title: Discord Markdown Links and Safety Warning
item.description: A discord community member Kazama Jas posted this Tweet warning people that Discord allows for markdown and evildoers can use it to post links that are hidden.

item.title: Tech Gear: FiiO M9 Media Player
item.description: I've been wanting to re-build my personal music library offline for a while now, for 2 reasons: 1) nostalgia for offline content that I don't have to rely on a streaming service for and 2) building up a library for DJ sets which ties into point number 1.

item.title: Popular Social Media Apps
item.description: I go through this cycle every few months - get major FOMO from all mainstream social apps (Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, Bluesky) and want to post content there, and then sit back and realize it was all for nothing because I'm not missing *a thing*.

item.title: Nostalgia Project: Retro Bit
item.description: I have a huge love for omg.

item.title: Surviving the Era of AI
item.description: I admit, I'm worried about AI and the loss of creativity in humanity.

item.title: Indieweb for Wordpress
item.description: There are a bunch of features I’ve enabled via the Indieweb plugin for Wordpress.

item.title: Street Fighter x Higround
item.description: I've been waiting for the pre-order for the new Street Fighter and Higround keyboard collab!

item.title: Keychron V10 Alice Layout Mechanical Keyboard
item.description: Keychron V10 Alice Layout Mechanical Keyboard She's a beauty and so far really comfortable to type on.

item.title: FreshRSS
item.description: I've been a fan of RSS since the beginning days of the web.

item.title: Codeberg Git Repo
item.description: <![CDATA[Codeberg Git Repon|I’ve updated my profile on Codeberg since it’s hosted and I already have my username there.

item.title: Simple.css & Homepage Redesign
item.description: <![CDATA[Simple.css & Homepage RedesignnI redid my homepage binarydigit.

item.title: Deleting Tweets
item.description: If you want to stay on the birdsite platform but delete old tweets, https://tweetdelete.

item.title: DuckDuckGo's Beta Email Protection Service
item.description: DuckDuckGo Email Protection is a free email forwarding service that removes multiple types of hidden email trackers and lets you create unlimited unique private email addresses on the fly without switching email providers or apps.
